data.name: Enclave - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy Enclave's world apart from visuals: with the Original Enclave Soundtrack! An acoustic experience of the action-packed adventure, with a total playing time of 65 minutes. Dedicated to all of you out there who face your own inner struggle. There is a battle between light and dark within us all, and a longing to come to peace with ourselves.

Soundtrack composed and performed by Gustaf Grefberg. Published by TopWare Interactive.

Vocalist: Gabriella Runsten
Goblin voices: Erik Pettersson
Additional voices: Kimberly Grefberg, Jens Matthies
Choirs from: Symphony of Voices, Classical Choir
Guitars from: Hans Zimmer’s Guitars 2

PLAYLIST


  • 01. Prologue - A Beginning -- [03:44]
  • 02. Enclave Theme -- [06:11]
  • 03. The Beat of a Warrior's Heart -- [05:23]
  • 04. Battle Anthem (The Invasion Begins) -- [04:20]
  • 05. Celenheim -- [01:53]
  • 06. The Divided City -- [06:07]
  • 07. For The Queen! -- [09:01]
  • 08. In The Name Of Peace (Kam-Zara in Ruins) -- [05:06]
  • 09. Mordessa -- [04:15]
  • 10. The Dreg'atar Horde -- [02:56]
  • 11. Vatar - Lord Of Darkness -- [02:20]
  • 12. The Battle Of Celenheim -- [03:00]
  • 13. Goblin Parade -- [05:53]
  • 14. For The Queen! (Teetow's Mix) -- [04:40]

data.short_description: Enjoy Enclave's world apart from visuals: with the Official Enclave Soundtrack! An acoustic experience of the action-packed adventure, with a total playing time of 65 minutes. Dedicated to all of you out there who face your own inner struggle.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Single Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 125 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.6
  • Processor: Single Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any, supported by OS
  • Storage: 125 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any, supported by OS
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.6
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any, supported by OS
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any, supported by OS

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 15.10 or SteamOS
  • Processor: Single Core CPU
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any, supported by OS
  • Storage: 125 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any, supported by OS
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 15.10 or SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any, supported by OS
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any, supported by OS
